page.title: 03BRIGG STATION (CONTINUED)
page.content: on the above prices. Due to lack of use the double track has been torn up outside Brigg level crossing and now has become a single line. We are of the opinion that this Eastern {artery} to the coast may well be closed in the near future. The booking office is now a private residence and there is a general air of deprivation around the 2l6O square metre{area.}We did notice that a mail-van met the lO.36 am from Sheffield but this was the only activity on the station. Of the trains we surveyed no{passenger}got off or on then and we feel that the townsfolk do not really appreciate their station and probably will not miss the amenity until it is gone. Obviously the new{fare}increase will depress this type of travel even further. { }
